snippet: Qaeda propagandists have provided online education to teach their devotees in the United States how to carry out smaller-scale solo attacks, like the Boston bombings.
abstract: News analysis; Boston Marathon bombing offers case study in complex mix of personality and ideology at work in extremist violence and raises question of whether there is any way to detect similar plans for terrorist attacks; bombing is small-scale attack similar to what Al Qaeda propagandists have called on their devotees in the United States to attempt.
lead_paragraph: Qaeda propagandists have provided online education to teach their devotees in the United States how to carry out smaller-scale solo attacks, like the Boston bombings.

headline.seo: Terrorists Find Online Education for Attacks
headline.main: A Homemade Style of Terror: Jihadists Push New Tactics

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
